lead_paragraph: The main security budget of more than a billion dollars for the 2012 London Summer Games will be supplemented by a contingency of $486.8 million, monitored by the British parliament and the Metropolitan Police. Tessa Jowell, Britain’s Olympics minister, released a written ministerial statement yesterday, giving the government a detailed budget for the Games. She said she did not expect the $19 billion total budget announced in March to be exceeded.
